snippet: Fog caused the cancellation of downhill racing at the final World Cup event of the season, giving the injured Lindsey Vonn a record sixth straight World Cup downhill title.
abstract: Fog leads to cancellation of downhill racing at final World Cup event of ski season, giving injured Lindsey Vonn a record straight World Cup downhill title.
lead_paragraph: Fog caused the cancellation of downhill racing at the final World Cup event of the season, giving the injured Lindsey Vonn a record sixth straight World Cup downhill title.

headline.seo: Cancellation Helps Injured Vonn Win Downhill Title
headline.main: Cancellation Helps Injured Vonn Win Downhill Title
